ExampleDefinition:
Examples/CreateSimpleChart/BoxPlotExampleView.xamlhttp://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.
/SciChart.Examples;component/Resources/Images/BoxPlotChart.png IconBoxPlot Demonstrates how to use create a Box Plot using SciChart
Demonstrates how to use the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.BoxPlotDataSeries%602.html']BoxPlotDataSeries[/url] and [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Box%20Plots%20Type.html']FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries[/url] to display statistical data.
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Box%20Plots%20Type.html']FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.BoxPlotDataSeries%602.html']BoxPlotDataSeries Type[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/What%20is%20a%20RenderableSeries.html']What is a RenderableSeries?[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/DataSeries%20Types%20in%20SciChart.html']DataSeries Types in SciChart[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Common%20RenderableSeries%20Properties.html']Common RenderableSeries Properties[/url]
